attributes.action: More money should be spent on environment , ext instead of historical artefacts
attributes.additional_details:
However I do think the  Notre Dame should be rebuild for culture and religious reasons ,however I think things should come before hand like helping people and charities 
Or 
Animal habitats and make more laws about deforestation being Illegal.
attributes.background:
As of the Notre Dame Being burnt , over 850 million euros was raised for the rebuild of this building. 
However couldn’t this money be spent on more things to help are planted?:pollution , more trees being planted and rebuild of animal habitats.
Or
Money being spent on cancer research.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. The 850 million Euros was pledged by private donors and not the UK Government or Parliament.
